text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I can still taste that smooth,<n>melt-in-your-mouth custard and<n>
slightly bitter espresso... I can't<n>believe they let us have as
much<n>tiramisu as we wanted!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
The souvenir shop also sells them, so<n>I'm definitely going
to buy some<n>before we head home! Hehe, I hope<n>the
others will like it! ♪
Stop it right there, Sweep!
Wham!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eek!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Owww...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I-I'm so sorry! Are you okay? ...Wait,<n>Spe?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
What?! You chased after us by foot?!<n>I'm sorry! We didn't
notice you at all!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oh, no, you're fine. I'm sure no one<n>would've thought
we'd literally come<n>running here...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I was planning to head back once Imanaged to catch her, but it'sridiculous how slippery she is...Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Y-you've sure had it rough...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Maybe I should just forget about<n>going back and do my
running here.<n>What's the training like here?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Train...ing?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Maruzen actually invited me to come<n>too, so I've been
curious about it. It<n>doesn't look like there are any<n>training
grounds, but... Huh? Spe?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Aaaah! Training!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Whoa!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I... came here... for training! What have<n>I been doing?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh... Don't tell me... you're just<n>remembering this now?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Nooo, you don't have to rub salt in<n>my wounds! Ugh, this is
no time to be<n>swooning over melt-in-your-mouth<n>custard!
I'm such a big, big dummy!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'll waste all my time goofing off at<n>this rate! Hold on, I'm
going to ask<n>Maruzen where I can go to train here!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
H-hey, are you all right? Maybe you<n>should take a deep
breath and... Wait,<n>Spe!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Welcome back! ♪ How was the<n>tiramisu? Oh! Scarlet, you
came!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Umm, I... I have to train right now! If I<n>don't—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh dear, the spell on you has broken!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Maruzen! You're terrible! I can't<n>believe you really lied to
me!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Now, now, no need to be mad. It's<n>true that this place can
help pull you<n>out of your rut!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I was planning on telling you this later,<n>but it's fine. Come
close and listen to<n>my story, would you?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ngh... O-okay!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Well... a long time ago, I also once<n>pushed myself too hard
because I<n>wanted to live up to the expectations<n>of those
around me.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I was overthinking everything so<n>much that it ended up
getting in the<n>way of my running...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?! You went through the same<n>thing too?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. I did. That's when my mother<n>brought me here, to
Bubblyland.

text_block_list.name: Young Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hey, this is a pool resort! You said<n>we'd be going to a
training facility.<n>How could you lie to me?!

text_block_list.name: Young Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
My race is next week! I don't have<n>time to fool around in
place like this!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Come on, just humor me and give<n>this place a try! Letting
your hair loose<n>is exactly what you need right now!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I was still skeptical, but I had no other<n>choice, so I danced at
the disco,<n>played in the pool, and spent all day<n>having fun...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Before I knew it, I forgot all about the<n>outside world and lost
myself in<n>having fun. The worries weighing on<n>my mind
and body disappeared, and<n>when I ran my race the
following<n>week...

text_block_list.name: Young Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff!
Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I remembered how to run again, as if<n>all my struggles had
been but a<n>dream.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky's Mother
text_block_list.text: See? Mom does take care of youafter all!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
...When I saw you two struggling, I<n>thought maybe you were
going<n>through the same thing I did when I<n>was younger.
That's why I brought<n>you here.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I had a feeling that if you both allowed<n>yourselves to reset
your minds and<n>bodies like I had, then perhaps you<n>would
be able to get back on track...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Like you...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Huh?)
Special Week brings her hands to her<n>chest... and freezes.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Spe? You okay?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Oh, I'm sorry!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Um... Well, the thing is... I guess,<n>maybe? I might be feeling a
bit better...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh my!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I... I haven't done anything to solve<n>my problem, but for
some reason, my<n>mind... kind of feels at ease!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Wonderful! That's a good thing! You<n>must be finally starting
to relax. I'm<n>sure things will start falling into place!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Huh? I feel like I've heard that<n>before...)

text_block_list.name: Spe's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Just trust me! Give it a try. Let go of<n>aaall your worries for a
while and you<n>might just find that it solves your<n>problem.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (I get it now. This is what Mom was<n>trying to tell me.)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(I didn't understand her at all then...<n>But it's like Maruzen is
saying—I had<n>total tunnel vision.)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'll have to apologize to her once I get<n>back.
Special Week clenches her fist.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Maruzen, I've made up my mind. I'm<n>going to give
Bubblyland a shot!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: That's what I like to hear!
